item.description:
We've just been invited to join The Boston Law Of Attraction Meetup members for a BEACH PICNIC!

This Sunday, 8/15, 1 - 6 pm. We'll have exclusive access to the lovely beach, pond & trails
at Camp Nihan (in Saugus). Bring your family & friends for a picnic, swim, hike and of course,
fun LOA activities too. There are also canoes, kayaks & paddleboats to enjoy. How awesome and abundant is that?


Who Should Come: members, kids & guests
Time: 1 - 6 pm (come when you can)

Cost: $5/ adult
Kids: free

DO NOT RSVP THROUGH THIS SITE! YOU MUST RSVP THROUGH THE BOSTON MEETUP SITE.

Details & RSVP: http://www.meetup.com...

Thank you to our hosts Chew-Hoong, Dave and Heather and Charlie!

Hope to see you there for some summer fun!

Ann and Mark

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Beach Picnic with Boston LoA meetup!
